TEI:
Kalittokai 57.
ituvumatu.
vēyeṉat tiraṇṭatōḷ veṟikamaḻ vaṇaraimpāṉ
māṉveṉṟa maṭanōkkiṉ mayiliyaṟ ṟaḷarpolki
yāycilam pariyārppa vaviroḷi yiḻaiyimaippak
koṭiyeṉa miṉṉeṉa vaṇaṅkeṉa yātoṉṟun
terikallā viṭaiyiṉkaṭ kaṇkavar poruṅkōṭa
vaḷamaicā luyarciṟappi ṉuntaitol viyaṉaka
riḷamaiyā ṉeṟipantō ṭikattantāy kēḷiṉi;
pūntaṇṭārp pularcāntiṟ ṟeṉṉava ṉuyarkūṭaṟ
ṟēmpāya vaviḻnīlat talarveṉṟa vamaruṇkaṇ
ṇēntukōṭ ṭeḻilyāṉai yoṉṉātārk kavaṉvēliṟ
cēntunī yiṉaiyaiyā yottatō ciṉmoḻi;
poḻipeyal vaṇmaiyā ṉacōkantaṇ kāviṉuṭ
kaḻikavi ṉiḷamāviṉ ṟaḷiraṉṉā yataṉṟalaip
paṇaiyamai pāymāṉṟē ravaṉceṟṟār niṟampāynta
kaṇaiyiṉu nōyceytal kaṭappaṉṟō kaṉaṅkuḻāy;
vakaiyamai taṇṭārāṉ kōṭuyar poruppiṉmēṟ
ṟakaiyiṇa riḷavēṅkai malaraṉṉa cuṇaṅkiṉāy
matavali mikukaṭāatta vaṉyāṉai maruppiṉuṅ
katavavāṟ ṟakkatō kāḻkoṇṭa viḷamulai;
eṉavāṅku,
iṉaiyaṉa kūṟa viṟaiñcupu nilaṉōkki
niṉaiyupu neṭitoṉṟu niṉaippāḷpōṉ maṟṟāṅkē
tuṇaiyamai tōḻiyark kamartta kaṇṇaḷ
maṉaiyāṅkup peyarntāḷe ṉaṟivakap paṭuttē.
